headline.print_headline: Jailed U.S. Contractor in Cuba Warns of Terminal Hunger Strike
headline.main: Jailed U.S. Contractor in Cuba Warns of Terminal Hunger Strike

lead_paragraph: The lawyer for jailed U.S. contractor Alan Gross told the press in Havana on Wednesday that his client planned to return from Cuba to his family within the year, dead or alive, and called on the Obama administration to do more to obtain his release.
